questions.question:
Add the Bitnami chart repository to your Helm configuration with the name `bitnami` and URL `https://charts.bitnami.com/bitnami`.

Update the repository to fetch the latest chart information. Verify success by listing all repositories.

Install the Bitnami nginx chart with the release name `web-server` in the `default` namespace.

Ensure the service type is set to `NodePort` and the port is set to `30080`. Only modify the necessary values without changing other default settings.

verification.description: Nginx chart is installed as web-server
Service type is NodePort with port 30080

questions.question:
Upgrade the `web-server` release to set replica count to 3.

Verify the update was successful by checking the number of pods.
